intents.sub_intent: how to save money on insurance premiums
intents.user_motivation: Users want actionable advice to reduce their insurance costs.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they are comparing insurance options or renewing policies.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Highlight ING's digital tools for comparing and optimizing insurance plans.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Listicle with actionable tips and embedded calculators.

intents.sub_intent: understanding key insurance terms and rules
intents.user_motivation: Users want to make informed decisions by understanding industry jargon.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they are new to insurance or exploring complex policies.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Leverage ING's expertise to simplify complex terms with easy-to-understand explanations.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Glossary-style content with examples and FAQs.

intents.sub_intent: common mistakes to avoid when dealing with insurance
intents.user_motivation: Users want to avoid pitfalls that could lead to higher costs or denied claims.
intents.search_context: Users search this when filing claims or negotiating with insurance providers.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Showcase ING's customer-centric approach to guiding users through the claims process.

intents.sub_intent: how to choose the right insurance plan
intents.user_motivation: Users want to identify the best insurance plan for their specific needs.
intents.search_context: Users search this when comparing providers or evaluating coverage options.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Promote ING's personalized insurance recommendations and digital tools.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Interactive comparison tool with personalized suggestions.

sub_intents: how to save money on insurance premiums
common mistakes to avoid when dealing with insurance
intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: ING's digital tools and customer trust can position it as a leader in cost-saving strategies.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Create a comprehensive guide that combines cost-saving tips, common mistakes, and ING's unique tools.

how to choose the right insurance plan
intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: ING's European expertise and customer-first approach can simplify complex topics for users.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Develop educational content with glossaries, FAQs, and interactive tools to empower users.
